docs.snippet: Casablanca has always had a seedy underbelly. Now a spike in violent crime has ignited a public outcry, a debate in parliament and an order from Morocco's king himself to crush this "menace."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Casablanca has always had a seedy underbelly. Now a spike in violent crime has ignited a public outcry, a debate in parliament and an order from Morocco's king himself to crush this "menace."

headline.main: Morocco Police Tackle Crime With Harsh Tactics
headline.print_headline: Morocco Police Tackle Crime With Harsh Tactics

docs.snippet: Sons and sisters of Cliven Bundy, the Nevada rancher who has been resisting efforts by federal agents to seize his cattle grazing without permits on public land, attempted to file police complaints on Friday accusing the agents of assault....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sons and sisters of Cliven Bundy, the Nevada rancher who has been resisting efforts by federal agents to seize his cattle grazing without permits on public land, attempted to file police complaints on Friday accusing the agents of assault.

headline.main: Bundy Sons in Nevada Accuse Feds of Assault in Police Complaint
headline.print_headline: Bundy Sons in Nevada Accuse Feds of Assault in Police Complaint

docs.snippet: The 1987 gang rape of an 18-year-old University of New Hampshire freshman by three fellow students set then-graduate student Jane Stapleton on a course that could revolutionize the way U.S. colleges and universities handle sexual assaults....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 1987 gang rape of an 18-year-old University of New Hampshire freshman by three fellow students set then-graduate student Jane Stapleton on a course that could revolutionize the way U.S. colleges and universities handle sexual assaults.

headline.main: New Hampshire University Sets National Model for Rape Prevention
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire University Sets National Model for Rape Prevention

docs.snippet: An annual spring party in a Southern California beach town devolved into a riot last month when revelers turned violent, rocking cars, smashing windows and throwing rocks. Dozens were injured and about 50 people ended up in the hospital, including...
docs.lead_paragraph: An annual spring party in a Southern California beach town devolved into a riot last month when revelers turned violent, rocking cars, smashing windows and throwing rocks. Dozens were injured and about 50 people ended up in the hospital, including several police officers.

headline.main: Police Use New Tool to Source Crowds for Evidence
headline.print_headline: Police Use New Tool to Source Crowds for Evidence
